title: Pool party skin, lets go!

replies.body:
> Hi guys, with 5 premade team and if we win 11 matches. We can unlock pool party mundo skin!

I think you may have misread the announcement... It's 55,000,000 points collectively, throughout the community, to unlock Pool Party Mundo.
Is there amount of points you have to achieve to collect the rewards per person or group?
You only need to contribute one point to receive PP Mundo when the world reaches 55mil points
even though the minimum points you can gain is 5 (for winning just one premade 5 game) it was also mentioned in the announcement
I'm pretty sure if you had to contribute points it would have been mentioned in the announcement. Unfortunately I can't find a FAQ for it, so I honestly don't know.
I'll join if we're not playing ranked
If there is a space im in! but im B5 btw.,..
add me please i really want skins and stuff
Im in i got pool party lenoa chuck us an invite
